players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Be careful, the mafioso is among us. I am the mafioso, as discovered during my investigation last night."
Diana: "I am a villager and I will work with the others to catch the mafioso. Please be cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Be careful, the mafioso is among us. I am the mafioso, as discovered during my investigation last night."
Diana: "I am a villager and I will work with the others to catch the mafioso. Please be cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
